snippet: The New York Times and other news organizations declared Mitt Romney the winner just moments after the polls closed, based on exit polls and early returns.
abstract: The New York Times and other news organizations declared Mitt Romney the winner just moments after the polls closed, based on exit polls and early returns.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- Mitt Romney has won the New Hampshire Republican primary, achieving a sweep of the first two critical contests in the 2012 presidential race and boosting his chances at becoming his party's nominee this fall.
